Life imprisonment is not enough for rapists, murderers etc. Life is only 12 years in prison, it should be until they are at deaths door. and half the time they only serve half of it anyway so really they are getting away with what they have done, they should be made to live with what they've done because the victim has to.

People who are not victims or a loved one of a victim of a crime generally for the sake of debate, will always make the rights of a criminal their first priorty. 
 Never mentioning victims and quickly dismissing your mention of the victims. 
 Any person who places their immediate needs or desires above the right of their victim should serve entire sentences. Dead victims get no reprieves. 
 Rape victims do not get their self esteem or their confidence and trust back after having a self absorbed monster imposed on them.
